name: Excommunication
flavor: You curse your foe to become a bane to their allies.

metadata.flavor: You curse your foe to become a bane to their allies.

effects.tier1: 9 + M damage; I < WEAK, weakened (save ends)

effects.name: Effect
effects.effect: At the end of each of your turns, a target weakened this way deals holy damage equal to twice your Presence score to each enemy within 2 squares of them. Additionally, a target weakened this way can't be targeted by their allies' abilities.
